experience: You and Peter both know Jeff Pulver, Mark Vange, and 2 others

MobileMonday, founded by Peter Vesterbacka and Vesku Paananen in 2000, brings the players in the mobile ecosystem around the world together. From it's humble beginnings in Helsinki, Finland, MobileMonday has grown to become the world's largest mobile community with a presence in every major city on every continent.
Cold. Dark. Slush on the ground. Not the Silicon Valley. Better. Better because different.

Some Bazaar is accelerating business by applying a shared everything model to business creation. Based on the methodology first documented in "Not the Big Bazaar Book" and "Still Not the Big Bazaar Book", ie attitude is everything.
Applying open source and peer production to movie making.

ConnectedDay is a service for daycare providers making it very easy to share pictures and videos of the children with the parents. Also enabling a dialog around what is shared, creating a richer dialog between children, parents and the daycare providers.
Getting things done in a reasonably big corporation...

Peter is a fantastic mobile professional and entrepreneur to work with. His personal networks cover just everything and everyone who matters in the mobile world and the tech start-up scene. Peter is full of blazing energy but yet focused on the target. He gets it. He is the mastermind behind Mobile Monday and Slush! among many other ideas that have changed the tech world. Any start-up working with Peter is - well, frankly said, just blessed. I <3 persons who just do it. No bullshit. Rock on!

March 18, 2009, Mark A.M. worked with Peter but at different companies

When I first met Peter I realized immediately why he was one of the Co-founders of MobileMonday.  Peter is a trail-blazer, a doer, an action oriented individual with an amazing knowledge of all things mobile. I am inspired by individuals like Peter because they have a certain drive towards getting useful things done.  Also, I have learned a lot from Peter Vesterbacka and would recommend him without hesitation to anyone looking for a person to get things done, especially with regards to the ever-evolving mobile industry.
